TopicTitle: Revert Flight grayed out + other menu options not working.

Articles.Content:
A couple days ago, while testing something out and trying to revert flight, the menu was all gray, the text was totally scrunched up, and there was a little gray bar where the staging is shown reaching from the top of the screen to the bottom that lit up slightly when you scroll over it. Since then, I have uninstalled all my mods, HyperEdit & Asteroid Day (which are both up-to-date), uninstalled KSP, cleaned up all debris and repaired all damaged buildings, and yet it still happens. Also, clicking on "Space Station" does absolutely nothing. Strange thing is, I've also tried to force it to go somewhere, I've totally destroyed my vehicles and killed my kerbals, but nothing shows up. No report saying "Catastrophic Failure!" and nothing giving me the option to revert flight or return to the space station/vab or hangar. It just stood there, the game wasn't frozen, everything was still going on as if nothing happened. Clicking also didn't force the menu to appear. Attached is a picture of the revert flight menu. Plz help

If it helps, not sure how, here is a link to the player log

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4S4W9ZdgMbPN2xrMkRtTGYxdW12QTBySnpkRFBuTzA1ZVFN/view?usp=sharing

Edited August 7, 2015 by BedrockPerson
Starting a new save seemed to work, but still open to a solution
